description: Raghuji Pant (रघुजी पन्त) is a veteran Nepalese politician and a long-standing member of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist) (CPN-UML). His career began in journalism in 1975, a field he remained in for nearly two decades before formally entering politics in 1994. He has held significant roles within the CPN-UML, including Standing Committee Member and head of various central departments. Pant has been elected to the Parliament of Nepal multiple times and has served in ministerial capacities, including as Minister for Labour and Transportation Management and Minister for Education, Science, and Technology.
short_description: Nepalese politician, journalist, and author who has served in various ministerial roles, including Minister for Education, Science, and Technology.
